attributes.action: appoint a Minister for Older People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much attention is given to the needs of children of all ages, and this is reflected in Government policy by appointing a Minister for Schools and Children; however, with an ageing population, it is time to appoint a Minister especially to deal with the needs and concerns of older people, who often appear to be forgotten by the Government.  It's time to create a Minister for Elderly Affairs.
